articles.title: Australian PM vows 'full force of law' after arson attack at Melbourne synagogue - BBC
articles.description: “Antisemitism has no place in Australia,” Anthony Albanese said after the latest in a string of attacks.
articles.content:
Inside the synagogue, some 20 people had sat down for dinner when the attack occurred
Australia's prime minister has promised to take strong action following an apparent arson attack on a synagogue … [+2160 chars]
